channel.title: Agriculture on Robin Choudhury
channel.description: Recent content in Agriculture on Robin Choudhury

item.title: Miami Mango Ratings
item.description: Full analysis here Mangos are grown widely in South Florida, but only a few varieties ever make it north, because they don’t really ship well and there isn’t a huge market. I ended up receiving some rare varieties from a collaborator down south, and I wanted to know how they ranked one to another, so my wife and I rated the different varieties. The Data My wife and I rated the mangoes over the course of about a week, tasting the different varieties as they felt more and more ripe.
